item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:

  • Die of the plague, killing yourself instantly.
  • If anyone else ever says, ‘What are we hyped for?’ you must reply ‘Assassins In The Palace 69!’
  • If anyone else ever says 'Assassins In The Palace 69! ’ you must reply ‘What are we hyped for?’
  • You may not say ‘Assassins In The Palace 69!’ or ‘What are we hyped for?’ before this.
    You must stop the madness

item.title: April Fools Except It's 2 Days Late - Well that was an absoloute shitshow
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
On another topic

Ew these knives smell

Every 20 mins you may make a player sniff your cheesy knives, forcing them to immediately make up a new post restriction for themsleves.
If anyone else ever says, ‘What are we hyped for?’ you must reply ‘Assassins In The Palace 69!’
If anyone else ever says 'Assassins In The Palace 69! ’ you must reply ‘What are we hyped for?’
You may not say ‘Assassins In The Palace 69!’ or ‘What are we hyped for?’ before this.

You win if you get lynched.

this was mine

Read full topic
